casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

May 6, 2013

[Cite as 05/06/2013 Case Announcements, 2013-Ohio-1828.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2012-1307. Riscatti v. Prime Properties Ltd. Partnership.

Cuyahoga App. No. 97270, 2012-Ohio-2921. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Cuyahoga County.

Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for leave to file a second supplement to the merit briefs, it is ordered by the court that the motion is granted and the second supplement to the merit briefs shall be filed within ten days of the date of this entry.
